titles.title: Supplementary data for 'Chapter 4: Sulfur cycling, an important process in the formation of the Anarraaq barite body and Zn-Pb-Ag deposit, Red Dog district, Alaska: a SIMS study of barite (δ34S and δ18O), pyrite and marcasite (δ34S)'

descriptions.description: Supplementary file associated with PhD thesis Chapter 4 - Sulfur cycling, an important process in the formation of the Anarraaq barite body and Zn-Pb-Ag deposit, Red Dog district, Alaska: a SIMS study of barite (δ34S and δ18O), pyrite and marcasite (δ34S). This includes one data table. Table. S4.1: SIMS data for pyrite, marcasite, and barite in the Anarraaq barite body and sulfide deposit.
